text: Lynn Wittstock is an American water polo player. She was a member of the United States women's national water polo team at the 1998 World Aquatics Championships. She was inducted in the USA Water Polo Hall of Fame. She played for University of California, Berkeley's women's water polo team. == References == == Other websites == * Truth Be Told With Lynn Wittstock: Cheaters, Regrets, and A Scavenger Hunt, USA Water Polo, July 3, 2014 * 8 Jan 1998- Lynn Wittstock of the USA takes a break during USA's 10-4 water polo loss to Russia getty Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:American water polo players
title: Lynn Wittstock
